Flow.description: * Added the check for Unbilled milestone to exclude them when exclude from billing=TRUE * V2: Add a Null check to see if the project is Active * This process is used to Automate Project closure. Will display Open TimeCards Open Billing Events Open Assignments Open Milestones.
Flow.label: PSA-Project Closure

fields.name: SelectAssignmentdisplay
fields.fieldText: Please close the following assignments:

fields.name: End_Date
fields.fieldText: End Date

fields.name: Closed_for_Time_Entry
fields.fieldText: Closed for Time Entry

fields.name: Closed_for_Expense_Entry
fields.fieldText: Closed for Expense Entry

fields.name: UpdateAssignmentsscreen
fields.fieldText: Assignment(s) updated.

fields.name: Billing_EventDisplaymessage
fields.fieldText: All billing events must be validated before closing the project. Please review and process the following items:

fields.name: Projectclosed
fields.fieldText: Project Closure complete. The project {!recordId.Name} will show closed tomorrow.

fields.name: Faultmessage
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultM﻿essage}

fields.name: Introscreens
fields.fieldText:
This process is used to Automate Project closure. We'll review the following records together:

  • Open TimeCards
  • Open Billing Events
  • Open Assignments
  • Open Milestones.

fields.name: MilestoneScreen
fields.fieldText: Please close the following Milestones

fields.name: Actual_Date
fields.fieldText: Actual Date

fields.name: Copy_1_of_UpdateAssignmentsscreen
fields.fieldText: ﻿ Milestone(s) updated.

fields.name: Assignmentscreen
fields.fieldText: All Assignments are closed. Please click Next

fields.name: Screen
fields.fieldText: All Milestones are closed. Please click finish.

fields.name: Projectnotactivescreen
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.Error_Message_flow}

Error!! Closed projects must be updated to In Progress before you can proceed with any changes

fields.name: NoTC_BEscreens
fields.fieldText: Timecards and Billing Events have been reviewed. Please click Next

fields.name: Copy_1_of_TCscreen
fields.fieldText: All timecards must be approved before closing the project. All billing events must be validated before closing the project. Please review and process the foll﻿owing items:

fields.name: OpenTCDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Open Timecards

fields.name: OpenBeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Open Billing Events

fields.name: Unbilledmilestonetext
fields.fieldText: Unbilled/Open Milestones

fields.name: TCscreen
fields.fieldText: All billable timecards must be processed through a billing event before the project can be closed. Please review the following items:

fields.name: unbilled_MilestoneScreen
fields.fieldText: Open & Unbilled Milestones
